ygData.subject: Re: FW: [shadowknight] A Lil more oon the duel
ygData.msgSnippet: But in effect they could only heal 60% of their health. They get down to 1 to 2 bubles and they are dead from the HT. an they will get there quikcer with out
ygData.messageBody:
But in effect they could only heal 60% of their health. They get down to 1 to 2
bubles and they are dead from the HT. an they will get there quikcer with out
pet beating them on the back of the head. And if you're really rich, give the
pet a Halbard. they will hit for up to 20 damage. I know. I've done it 8)

Inos


Thom Shartle wrote:

> From: "Thom Shartle" <darklingsanction@...>
>
> We would be absolutely screwed. Their Lay hands heals ALL their HP not a
> limited amount like our Harm Touch. They get down to 1 bubble, Lay hands and
> are back to full.
>
> Not equal in any shape, manner or form (especially considering they can go
> into all the cities except the couple of evil ones).
>
> Sthiel
> Cazic-Thule
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: D Thoma [mailto:milamber@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 3:26 PM
> To: shadowknight@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [shadowknight] A Lil more oon the duel
>
> From: "D Thoma" <milamber@...>
>
> I wish their was a way to save the text output from the duel, and be able to
> send it to 929 or whomever makes the adjustments to the characters, and
> invite them to test it themselves, because I am sure they can create a
> character(s) at whatever level they want (including stats) with the
> equipment they want and see what happens. Maybe that would get their
> attention that we might need a power boost. And maybe publish the results
> for us and everyone to see. (But honestly I doubt they would take the time,
> they got our money already).
>
> I guess my 2 questions is shouldn't we be equal to a paladin at the same
> level warrior wise and equal to the magic ability as a paladin is. I guess
> our god is not as powerful as the paladin's god, maybe that is the correct
> assumption? or maybe a shadow knight was an after thought to the game (hey
> lets add some "evil" classes to the game) and never fully tested. Because
> if I have read the posts correctly that no one ever made it to level 50
> shadow knight (I think I read that in the undiscovered weapons) in the beta,
> but they did make a paladin level in the beta (and that is why they knew the
> weapons available for the paladin), if I am wrong let me know.
>
> Maybe someone should find a paladin and do a duel with them (same armor and
> weapons should be used and preferably stats, and of course the applicable
> spells) and see what happens.
>
> Just my 2 cents.
>
> David
> Tenin (DE - lvl 7 - Tarew Marr)
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Adam Hill <adamthehill@...>
> To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 2:31 PM
> Subject: [shadowknight] A Lil more oon the duel
>
> From: "Adam Hill" <adamthehill@...>
>
> Allright, lets do this in detail.
> My guildmate and i had friendly duel. He was a 18th level Halfling Druid I
> myslef was a 17th level Dark Elf Shadowknight. He had full leather and a
> screaming mace. I had a shiny brass halberd, Full bronze Platemail, 110 str
> after siphoning. He rooted me and blasted me with a spell doing 37 pts a
> turn and Stinging swarm. I got the joy of casting my three spells at him
> until i was un rooted and harm touched him. The harm touch did HALF a bubble
> YES HALF. after he was taxed. Now at melee. My halberd was doing about one
> to twenty nine pints of damage. at one time in the duel, I did one point of
> damage three times in a row. Also, 75% of my spells were laughed off. the
> only good thing i did in my fight was dodge and parry quite often(helps to
> be a dark elf fer that). Well thats about that. Rather embarrasing and
> disheartening. In beta I played a warrior and never lost a battle.
>
